name: Nowhere in Sight
description:
Experience the story of a boy using echolocation for his vision.

A game made for "Free Project I" on HKU University of Arts Utrecht.

With a team of 6 people (Team 13/Team Streepje) we worked on the project. These are:

Dylan Smit, Iris van der Jagt, Max de Wilde, Michael Smith, Nadja May Kramer en Yun Visser.

We received guidance from Valentijn Muijrers

Controls:

WASD        - Movement
R           - Repeat audio hint
Mouse       - Look around
Left click  - Interact
Right click - Snap fingers

If the .EXE is deleted, turn off your antivirus
